categories: Category:Cut content from Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic II: The Sith Lords

nodes.text: The 12th Engineering Division was a division that participated in the Battle of Malachor V, under the command of Jedi General Meetra Surik.
In a cut content in Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic II: The Sith Lords, Bao-Dur reveals that he and the Sullustan mechanic, Tien Tubb were part of this division.
